title: Photography Limits Our Understanding of the World

content.question: Write an essay that argues your position on Sontag’s claim that photography limits our understanding of the world.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that argues your position on Sontag’s claim that photography limits our understanding of the world.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
